_description: James Ryman, On the Annunciation — four stanzas rhyme royal and burden: ‘As gabriell archaungell seyde / Now criste is borne of a pure meyde’

CULEe112.First Lines:
That archaungell shynyng full brightCame vnto marie that myelde
                    maydeBut lete vs singe & make alle myrthIn honoure nowe of his
                    swete birth…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…As Gabriell Archaungell seydeNow criste is borne of a pure
                    meyde
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 260.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 178; 1977, 157-8.
